full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Construction Management Services for RSS NCR Main and TerraCanada NCR Projects

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3819788409
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3819788409
* **Publication Date**: May 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 1, 2023 2:00 PM EST
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to contractors that are eligible under the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Description

This tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Construction Management Services for two separate projects: the TerraCanada NCR and RSS NCR Main. The projects are managed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Eligible Respondents

The following contractors are eligible to bid on the project in alphabetical order:

* Bird Construction Group
* EBC Inc.
* Ellisdon Corporation
* PCL Constructors Canada Inc.
* Pomerleau Inc.

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

## Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Wesley Fenwick at wesley.fenwick@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  Please note that this tender is now in Phase Two of the Request for Proposal. We thank all respondents for their interest in participating in this process.  Note: This is a competitive tender, and all interested contractors are
